Articles.Content: I play KSP nearly every day, when I get the chance. I've probably started it up 8, 9 times in the past week. But never before have I seen this particular splash screen. Is this normal? Is that kerbal not meant to be wearing a full helmet? Perhaps this is the work of a mod? Color me confused.
It's an easter egg. And I guess your thread will be locked in a few
I've seen this same screen before in non-modded saves. I think it's a new Easter egg.

It's an easter egg. And I guess your thread will be locked in a few

Yup. It's an Easter Egg added by Toolbar. Probably gonna be locked really soon. There have been a ton of threads about this before.
Obviously a bug. You should delete KSP and try reinstalling it.

Yup. It's an Easter Egg added by Toolbar. Probably gonna be locked really soon. There have been a ton of threads about this before.

Eyup.

*sighs*
What number thread is this? #58 or #59? You'd think people would just look it up by now...
It's an easter egg from one of the mods you've got installed.
